meta.name: Interrogation Raw
meta.description: Interrogation Raw tells the stories of dramatic murders and other serious crimes through the prism of the gripping interrogations of the accused.

videos.title: A Hitman for the Heartbroken
videos.overview: When a beloved pediatric dentist is shot dead in a parking garage, what appears to be a random homicide turns into an international manhunt; detectives uncover a sinister stalking plan executed by a hired hitman.

videos.title: A Hitman for the Heartbroken
videos.overview: When a beloved pediatric dentist is shot dead in a parking garage, what appears to be a random homicide turns into an international manhunt; detectives uncover a sinister stalking plan executed by a hired hitman.

videos.title: Justice for a War Hero
videos.overview: Neighbors find an elderly veteran injured claiming he was kidnapped and beaten. As the 91-year-old's health rapidly declines, pressure mounts for detectives to obtain a confession from the perpetrators and get justice for the decorated war hero.

videos.title: A Hitman for the Heartbroken
videos.overview: When a beloved pediatric dentist is shot dead in a parking garage, what appears to be a random homicide turns into an international manhunt; detectives uncover a sinister stalking plan executed by a hired hitman.

videos.title: A Hitman for the Heartbroken
videos.overview: When a beloved pediatric dentist is shot dead in a parking garage, what appears to be a random homicide turns into an international manhunt; detectives uncover a sinister stalking plan executed by a hired hitman.

videos.title: Lost in the Leaves
videos.overview: A small town is shaken when a mother, her two children and her best friend mysteriously vanish. Investigators find the family's home covered in blood but very few clues. A minute detail helps authorities track down a suspect, but they need answers from him before time runs out.

videos.title: Tangled Affairs
videos.overview: Authorities investigate when an art teacher is killed in her own home, and they bring her husband and a growing list of suspects into the interrogation room to face hard-hitting questions in the hopes of learning why the teacher was murdered.

videos.title: A Betrayal of Trust
videos.overview: Detectives rush to find a missing girl who was staying with a murder victim, and as they investigate the dramatic situation, a familiar name becomes a prime suspect, so they interrogate him in the hopes of finding the girl alive.

videos.title: Bride-to-Be Murder Mystery
videos.overview: After a woman is brutally murdered just a week before her wedding, detectives interrogate three possible suspects, including her fiancé.

videos.title: Murderous Friendship
videos.overview: A woman goes missing and interrogators have tough questions for the friend she was last seen with.

videos.title: Unrequited Love
videos.overview: A woman is murdered by the foster daughter she took in. But an open-and-shut case becomes more complicated as evidence emerges that the foster daughter may not have acted alone.

videos.title: Conduct Unbecoming
videos.overview: After a woman goes missing, a married Navy police officer contends with tough questions about his romantic relationship with the victim; after a decade on the run, officers interrogate the wife accused of murdering her husband.

videos.title: Who Murdered the Postman?
videos.overview: Detectives put pressure on their prime suspect as they investigate the shooting death of a U.S. postal employee to determine if the killing was intentional or if the postal worker's death was actually an accident, as the suspect claims.

videos.title: Serial Killer at the VA Hospital
videos.overview: Investigators wonder if a nurse's aide may be a serial killer after several mysterious deaths occur at a VA hospital located in West Virginia.

videos.title: Murder by Scissors
videos.overview: A boyfriend becomes the main murder suspect after he finds his partner stabbed with a pair of scissors.

videos.title: Something in the Water
videos.overview: A young woman's body parts are found in a suspect's plumbing and freezer and when he's brought into the interrogation room, his bizarre behavior stuns even the most seasoned detectives.

videos.title: Deadly Dad
videos.overview: After a 20-year-old man is crushed by a truck that fell off its jack, the victim's father is brought in to face questions over whether it was really an accident…or murder.

videos.title: Stone Cold Murder
videos.overview: The authorities interrogate two individuals to determine which one of them pulled the trigger and shot a man outside a local shop; the authorities interrogate a woman who is accused of hitting two children with her vehicle.

videos.title: Neighbor from Hell
videos.overview: A man's body is found in a wooded area and the victim's neighbor is brought into the interrogation room, where evidence mounts even as he's being interviewed.

videos.title: Left for Dead in the Cold
videos.overview: When four acquaintances are interrogated about the fatal beating of a young father left on the side of the road, they begin to blame each other for the crime.

videos.title: The Cigarette Break
videos.overview: A young man is accused of killing a beloved 52-year-old woman, but the accused changes his story after a cigarette break; homicide detectives solve a murder mystery from decades past thanks to advances in DNA technology.

videos.title: A Family Tragedy
videos.overview: A neighbor answers tough questions in the interrogation room after an intruder kills three members of a family in Minnesota and leaves only one survivor.

videos.title: Victim or Accomplice?
videos.overview: A woman who traveled with a serial killer sits down with the authorities who want to determine whether she was a victim or an accomplice to the killer's crimes; a man makes a startling confession about killing a college student.

videos.title: The Demon Inside
videos.overview: A prolific serial killer's confession in the murder of a young woman turns out to be a hoax but decades later a more likely suspect is ready to talk, under one condition.

videos.title: The Missing Priest
videos.overview: The search for a missing priest leads detectives on a multi-state manhunt for a suspect who may be the only person with the answers to his whereabouts.

videos.title: A Christmas Nightmare
videos.overview: Investigators look into a tragic first date after a 25-year-old college student vanishes on Christmas Eve, and they search for answers as to what went wrong.

videos.title: Until Murder Do Us Part
videos.overview: When a 70-year-old grandmother passes away suspiciously on a road trip, investigators uncover a sinister murder plot while searching for her remains.

videos.title: The Killer Hitchhiker
videos.overview: Investigators search for the mystery killer after a man and woman are found shot on the side of the highway, and they find a break in the case when a deputy comes across the victim's missing car filled with guns and silencers.

videos.title: A Lovers Betrayal
videos.overview: After the dismembered remains of a missing woman are found in a freezer, investigators uncover a love triangle and a murderous conspiracy to conceal the truth.

videos.title: A Shot in the Dark
videos.overview: A series of random nighttime shootings has the city of Phoenix on edge as police try to end the reign of terror and interrogate two suspects.

videos.title: Murdered Amongst Friends
videos.overview: After 22 years, a local news story reignites a decades-old cold case, leading investigators to question a close-knit circle of friends who they believe are hiding the truth about the disappearance of a 25-year-old man. Can investigators convince the group of friends to reveal who the killer is and finally get justice for the victim?

videos.title: Murder in Myrtle Beach
videos.overview: After a successful businessman is brutally strangled, investigators become suspicious of his widow and her secret friend.

videos.title: Serial Killer on the Run
videos.overview: A serial killer faces tough questions in the interrogation room after finally being apprehended following decades spent on the run, and three suspects begin to cast blame after a woman's body is found in the middle of the road.

videos.title: The Murder of Rambo
videos.overview: In 2012, 26-year-old Timothy "Rambo" Ramsey is killed in a drive-by shooting, but the investigation yields little evidence, and the case goes cold for six years. When detectives re-examine the evidence, they uncover a violent feud between two men...and one of those men may have pulled the trigger in the drive-by shooting. Can detectives get a confession and finally get closure for the family?

videos.title: Test of Faith
videos.overview: Just after sunrise, investigators respond to a local hospital where an elderly woman is fighting for her life after a brutal six hour assault in her home. Though bruised from head to toe, the victim is able to describe the vicious assault by an unknown intruder in the middle of the night. Quick detective work points the officers to a suspect, but once in the interrogation room, he stonewalls detectives. As evidence starts to mount against the suspect, the victim's health takes a turn for the worse. Can investigators get the suspect to confess and get justice for the elderly victim before it's too late?

videos.title: A Mother's Touch
videos.overview: When an otherwise healthy young woman is admitted to the hospital with sudden organ failure, an anonymous tip leads authorities to investigate a pattern of unexplained deaths in her family and a shocking prime suspect.

videos.title: A Deadly Drink for Dad
videos.overview: When an 85-year-old man passes away after years of failing health, authorities quickly rule it a natural death and close the case. But years later, a bombshell recording reveals that those closest to him may have played a hand in his passing. Can detectives bring dark family secrets to light in the interrogation room?

videos.title: Three's a Crowd
videos.overview: Ten years after a young mother allegedly abandoned her family, her mother-in-law reveals a shocking secret: she believes both of her daughter-in-law's lovers murdered her.

videos.title: House of Horrors
videos.overview: Investigators question the mother of a deceased baby and her estranged husband to determine how the child died and ended up in a cardboard box, and as they search for answers, they determine who is responsible for the awful crime.

videos.title: Massacre in Maine
videos.overview: At the scene of a chilling triple murder in Northern Maine, detectives recover DNA evidence that suggests an out-of-town visitor may be behind the brutal crime.

videos.title: Most Notorious - Ariel Castro
videos.overview: The authorities search for the man responsible for abducting three women who vanished from the streets of Cleveland for a full decade, and they unravel details about the kidnappings that grabbed national attention in the United States

videos.title: Honey, Are You in There?
videos.overview: The authorities begin to question an apparent suicide because they cannot find a gun next to the body.

videos.title: Killer Charm
videos.overview: fter an 80-year-old woman vanishes, local police and the FBI team up in the pursuit of a suspected serial killer.

videos.title: First Comes Marriage Then Comes Murder
videos.overview: When a young woman vanishes, detectives zero in on her controlling estranged husband--whose story continually changes in the interrogation room.

videos.title: Gone Girl
videos.overview: A mother from Florida vanishes into the night after celebrating her daughter's first birthday; in their search to find her, the police seek answers from the father of her child.

videos.title: The Devil Inside
videos.overview: When police pull over a local man for violating his parole, the case takes a shocking turn when he suddenly confesses to multiple brutal murders.

videos.title: I Promise It Was Him
videos.overview: A woman calls 911 with a story of being abducted and forced into the trunk of her car by a masked assailant who fatally shoots her girlfriend. While investigators attempt to determine if the murder was the result of an elaborate kidnapping plan, a neighbor's security camera might have the answer.

videos.title: Broken Brotherhood
videos.overview: A brutal home invasion results in a man being beaten to death and set on fire. As investigators race to find the perpetrator, a shocking 911 call pits two brothers against each other in the interrogation room.

videos.title: Murder on the Family Farm
videos.overview: A small Kentucky community is rocked to its core when a prominent family is gunned down in their home after Sunday church service. The sole survivor of the attack, the victims' son, claims he killed an intruder in self-defense. But the detectives' investigation takes a shocking turn when someone comes forward with evidence that the son may not be as innocent as he claims. Can interrogators uncover the truth of who's really behind the family farm massacre?

videos.title: A Husband and a Hitman
videos.overview: After police respond to a home security alarm, they find a young mother brutally murdered but few clues. Investigators soon turn their attention to her husband who reveals information only the killer should know.

videos.title: Celebrity Under Oath
videos.overview: This special brings viewers inside the courtroom as celebrities are forced to sit in the hot seat and provide on-camera testimony. With access like never before, this episode dives into what really happens when A-list celebrities go to court.

videos.title: War of the Wilders
videos.overview: A young mother is found murdered in her home, leading detectives to question whether her fiancé or ex-husband could be responsible for her death.

videos.title: Evil, Hateful and Lowdown
videos.overview: After a house fire that took the life of a bedridden man is deemed intentional, evidence leads detectives to a close family member who lit the match.

videos.title: Houseguest Horror
videos.overview: When an elderly man is found shot to death in his backyard, the investigation leads to a young woman he welcomed into his home.

videos.title: Concrete Evidence
videos.overview: After a Florida man is reported missing, detectives zero in on his roommate, the last person to see him, before receiving a tip that breaks the case wide open.

videos.title: Ordered to Kill
videos.overview: When a young Missouri couple is found shot to death on their porch, detectives uncover a sinister murder plot masterminded by someone within their inner circle.

videos.title: The Bad Review
videos.overview: After a Missouri man is brutally stabbed to death in his own bed, detectives discover a sex worker who may have wanted him silenced.

videos.title: Killed for Convenience
videos.overview: Detectives hope a woman can identify her attacker as she fights for her life after being shot in the face and investigators race to get a confession after a man is gunned down in a motel parking lot.

videos.title: Friends Who Kill
videos.overview: After a young father is strangled to death and abandoned on a remote country road, authorities must track down and interrogate a group of friends who each have something to hide.

videos.title: Twisted Mind of a Killer
videos.overview: When a young woman is found murdered and an elderly couple is reported missing, investigators cross state lines to track down a man that they believe is responsible.

videos.title: Twisted Sisterhood
videos.overview: When a beloved father is shot to death in his own home, detectives unravel an unexpected plot devised by his inner circle.

videos.title: Vanished Into the Night
videos.overview: A young woman vanishes after a night out at a local bar and investigators race against the clock to track down her final movements, eventually locating a potential suspect who is anything but honest.

videos.title: Murder On a Haunted Road
videos.overview: When an aspiring musician goes missing in South Carolina, police turn their attention to his roommates and a trip they took to a local "haunted" road.

videos.title: Justice for a War Hero
videos.overview: Neighbors find an elderly veteran injured claiming he was kidnapped and beaten. As the 91-year-old's health rapidly declines, pressure mounts for detectives to obtain a confession from the perpetrators and get justice for the decorated war hero.

videos.title: A Hitman for the Heartbroken
videos.overview: When a beloved pediatric dentist is shot dead in a parking garage, what appears to be a random homicide turns into an international manhunt; detectives uncover a sinister stalking plan executed by a hired hitman.
